Java SE 15 & JDK 15

Uses of Class
java.util.zip.ZipFile

Packages that use ZipFile
Package Description
com.sun.jarsigner
This package comprises the interfaces and classes used to define the signing mechanism used by the jarsigner tool.
java.util.jar
Provides classes for reading and writing the JAR (Java ARchive) file format, which is based on the standard ZIP file format with an optional manifest file.
jdk.security.jarsigner
This package defines APIs for signing jar files.

  • Uses of ZipFile in com.sun.jarsigner

    Methods in com.sun.jarsigner that return ZipFile
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ZipFile ContentSignerParameters.getSource()
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Retrieves the original source ZIP file before it was signed.

  • Uses of ZipFile in java.util.jar

    Subclasses of ZipFile in java.util.jar
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  JarFile
    The JarFile class is used to read the contents of a jar file from any file that can be opened with java.io.RandomAccessFile.

  • Uses of ZipFile in jdk.security.jarsigner

    Methods in jdk.security.jarsigner with parameters of type ZipFile
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void JarSigner.sign​(ZipFile file, OutputStream os)
    Signs a file into an OutputStream.
